name: Shop Intro
_source: s;Simon;What are you doing hiding in the trees? Is everything alright?

s;Villager Man 6;The heretic.{w} He came into the temple where I was selling my wares.{w}{br}He had this crazed look in his eyes. {w}He started smashing things near the shrine.{w}{br}I ran before he could get to me.
s;Simon;Do you know who this heretic is?
s;Villager Man 6;No.{w} But he kept cursing the Fates. In Lachesis's temple no less!{w}{br}I hope Lachesis curses him with great misfortune!
s;Villager Man 6;Oh, and while you're here... looking to buy something?
